source.name: Snow Clearing - Chart View
source.description: Measures the percentage of Edmonton residential neighbourhoods that have been snow cleared after a snow event. As mandated by City Bylaw (###), 100% of residential neighbourhoods are to bladed within 7 days after a snow event. Note that the first two days after a snow event are prioritized to clear arterial and collector roads.
